INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_FUND_HOLD_REC (AC_FUND_HOLD_RID, CMPNY_IBUSDATE, CMPNY_BUSDATE, MRKT_IBUSDATE, MRKT_BUSDATE, AC_ID, SEGR_FUND_ID, CCY_CDE, CMPNY_CDE, TXN_TYP_ID, REF_NUM, HOLD_AMT, EXPR_DATE, FUND_HOLD_TYP, FUND_HOLD_STAT, FUND_CHNL_CDE, EXTRNL_REF_NUM, REMRK, HOLD_DATE, HOLD_BY, RELSE_DATE, RELSE_BY, RELSE_AMT, LAST_RELSE_DATE, LAST_RELSE_BY, INSTCL_ID, MRKT_ID, CALNDR_ID, INSTR_BAT_GRP_ID, AC_FUND_HOLD_TXN_ID, IS_INSTR_RELT, IS_POST, EXTRNL_SYS_CDE, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ, INTRNL_REF) VALUES (#{item.acFundHoldRid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.cmpnyIbusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.cmpnyBusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.mrktIbusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.mrktBusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.acId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.segrFundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.ccyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cmpnyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.txnTypId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.refNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.holdAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.exprDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.fundHoldTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fundHoldStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fundChnlCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.extrnlRefNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.holdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.holdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.relseBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relseAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.lastRelseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastRelseBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.instclId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.mrktId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.calndrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.instrBatGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acFundHoldTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isInstrRelt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.extrnlSysCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.intrnlRef,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
